data.title: Sarah Clarke
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

Samuel Barker

Sarah Clarke

Born: Abt 1790

Marriage: Samuel Barker on 12 Jan 1842 in Elmswell Parish Church, Elmswell, Suffolk, England

Died: 1848, Elmswell, Elmswell, Suffolk, England aged about 58

Buried: 25 Jun 1848, Elmswell Parish Church, Elmswell, Suffolk, England

Noted events in her life were:

 Marriage, 12 Jan 1842, Elmswell Parish Church, Elmswell, Suffolk, England. Marriage of Samuel Barker (labourer, widower, from this parish) and Sarah Clarke (single, from another parish) on 12 Jan 1842 at Elmswell Parish Church; officiated by Edward Claydon Lawton. Witnessed by James Barrell(?) and Joseph Baker.

Samuel's father given as Jeremiah Barker, Shoemaker. Sarah's father given as John Clarke, Baker.

Source: www elmswell-history org uk

 Death, 1848, RD Stow, Suffolk, England. Name: Sarah Barker

Year: 1848

Quarter: Apr-May-Jun

District: Stow

County: Suffolk

Volume: 12

Page: 321

 Burial, 25 Jun 1848, Elmswell Parish Church, Elmswell, Suffolk, England. Elmswell Parish Records - Burials from January 1813 to January 1889

Name: Sarah Barker - of this parish

Date: 25 Jun 1848

Age: 58 Years

Ceremony performed by: E Lawton

Source: www elmswell-history org uk

 R01 Relationship to RJB: 2nd wife of 4th Great-grandfather.

Sarah married Samuel Barker, son of Jeremiah Barker and Elizabeth Bloomfield, on 12 Jan 1842 in Elmswell Parish Church, Elmswell, Suffolk, England. (Samuel Barker was born about 1777 in Swefling, Suffolk, England and died in 1866 in Stowmarket, Suffolk, England.)
